ing: 3 bananas, peeled and sliced lengthwise and crosswise
des: "On Father's Day we all tried this delicious dessert, which everyone loved.  Bananas warmed in buttery rum sauce over vanilla ice cream."
ins: In a large, deep skillet over medium heat, melt butter.  Stir in sugar, rum, vanilla and cinnamon.  When mixture begins to bubble, place bananas and walnuts in pan.  Cook until bananas are hot, 1 to 2 minutes.  Serve at once over vanilla ice cream.
